# File lib/captcha_config.rb, line 39
                def config
                        return @@config if @@config
                        
                        if File.exists?(File.join(RAILS_ROOT, 'config', 'captcha.yml'))
                                @@config = YAML.load_file(File.join(RAILS_ROOT, 'config', 'captcha.yml'))
                        else
                                @@config = {}
                        end
                        
                        @@config
                end
